biography: Pien is an explorer of the code of life itself. As a Genomics Data Scientist, she uses her computational skills to analyze vast datasets of genetic information, searching for patterns that can predict disease, explain biological functions, and unlock the secrets of evolution. She is patient, meticulous, and driven by a deep curiosity about what makes us who we are at the most fundamental level.
